name: The Wondrous Path of Truth
title: Faruzan: The Wondrous Path of Truth
in_play_description: When the Dazzling Polyhedron created by Faruzan who has this card equipped enters play and when the Action Phase begins: Create 1 Anemo Die.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Faruzan to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Faruzan, equip this card.
After Faruzan equips this card, immediately use The Wind's Secret Ways.
When the Dazzling Polyhedron created by Faruzan who has this card equipped enters play and when the Action Phase begins: Create 1 Anemo Die.
(You must have Faruzan in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
